title: Faint memories of the Milky Way
caption: Faint outline of Milky Way over the Tantalus Range, with cloud filled Squamish Valley, BC.

title: Sky Pilot Sunrise
content:
I was reluctant to get out of the sleeping bag at 4am and face the onslaught of mosquitoes, but it was well worth it.

Watching the sun rise over the Coast Mountains of BC, from under the Sky Pilot mountain near Squamish, BC.
caption: Sunrise over the Coast Mountains of BC
